description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create security group.

Actual result:
Description is mandatory parameter when creating Security Group.

Expected result:
Description should not be mandatory parameter when creating Security Group.

Explanation:
1. Description is not mandatory information.
2. Inconsistency with other Open Stack items (any other item in Open Stack doesn't require to enter Description mandatory).
title: Description is mandatory parameter when creating Security Group

comments.content:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create security group.

Actual result:
Description is mandatory parameter when creating Security Group.

Expected result:
Description should not be mandatory parameter when creating Security Group. This is inconsistency bug since any other item in Open Stack doesn't require to enter Description mandatory.
